biotools.summary: The tool is designed to perform image pre-processing to reduce the bias field effect, improving the quality of the image. Two main functionalities are offered: (1) Apply N4 filter to image/images (either with the default parameters values or with parameters values defined by the user) (2) Find the optimal configuration of the N4 filter for specific image/images by measuring the Full Width at Half Maximum (FWHM) of the periprostatic fat distribution.
